resources.string: To Use a part of function in device, the func permission is required. If you dont accept the permission, this service wont be available.
To Use base infomation in device, If you dont accept the permission, this service wont be available.
To call media from external memory card, users permission is required. if you dont accept the permission, videos from external memory card wont be shown.
Did you insert the SD card? \ nIf so, please set up your SD card usage .
Allows the app to access the SD card.
Please allow the app to access the SD card first by following instructions below.
1. Tap the SD card in the side menu. /n2. Tap the select button at the bottom.
